Working to connect individuals searching for jobs and assisting companies looking to fill full and part time positions, U.S. Senators Tom Carper and Chris Coons, and U.S. Representative John Carney today announced the dates of three job fairs this spring:  Monday, March 23...</description>    <guid>newsroom/releases/release/carper-coons-carney-will-host-three-job-fairs-this-spring</guid>   </item>                <item>    <title>Senator Coons re-introduces bipartisan bill to strengthen parent-school partnerships</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/newsroom/releases/release/senator-coons-re-introduces-bipartisan-bill-to-strengthen-parent-school-partnerships</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Wed, 04 Mar 2015 08:48:00 EST</pubDate>    <description>WASHINGTON &ndash; With the support of the Delaware PTA, U.S. Senator Chris Coons (D-Del.) has re-introduced the bipartisan Family Engagement in Education Act, aimed at helping schools and families work together to support learning and raise student achievement.&nbsp; The legislation, which was...</description>    <guid>newsroom/releases/release/senator-coons-re-introduces-bipartisan-bill-to-strengthen-parent-school-partnerships</guid>   </item>                <item>    <title>Statement of Senator Coons on address by Prime Minister Netanyahu</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/newsroom/releases/release/statement-of-senator-coons-on-address-by-prime-minister-netanyahu</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Tue, 03 Mar 2015 15:35:00 EST</pubDate>    <description>WASHINGTON &ndash; U.S. Senator Chris Coons (D-Del.), a member of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee, issued the following statement Tuesday following the address by Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu before a joint meeting of Congress:&nbsp; &ldquo;Prime Minister Netanyahu delivered a strong...</description>    <guid>newsroom/releases/release/statement-of-senator-coons-on-address-by-prime-minister-netanyahu</guid>   </item>                <item>    <title>Coons, Durbin, Hirono introduce patent reform bill to protect innovation, confront abuse</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/newsroom/releases/release/coons-durbin-hirono-introduce-patent-reform-bill-to-protect-innovation-confront-abuse</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Tue, 03 Mar 2015 07:00:00 EST</pubDate>    <description>WASHINGTON &ndash; U.S. Senators Chris Coons (D-Del.) and Dick Durbin (D-Ill.), members of the Senate Judiciary Committee, and Mazie Hirono (D-Hawaii), member of the Senate Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship, will introduce legislation on Tuesday to strengthen America&rsquo;s patent system and targ...</description>    <guid>newsroom/releases/release/coons-durbin-hirono-introduce-patent-reform-bill-to-protect-innovation-confront-abuse</guid>   </item>                <item>    <title>Senator Coons urges Supreme Court to empower Americans to end partisan gerrymandering</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/newsroom/releases/release/senator-coons-urges-supreme-court-to-empower-americans-to-end-partisan-gerrymandering</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Mon, 02 Mar 2015 15:51:00 EST</pubDate>    <description>WASHINGTON &ndash; U.S. Senator Chris Coons (D-Del.), a member of the Senate Judiciary Committee, sharply criticized the rampant gerrymandering that is rigging our democracy, as the Supreme Court heard oral arguments on Monday in the case of Arizona State Legislature v...</description>    <guid>newsroom/releases/release/senator-coons-urges-supreme-court-to-empower-americans-to-end-partisan-gerrymandering</guid>   </item>                <item>    <title>The Senator's Week Ahead Schedule for March 2-6</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/blog/post/the-senators-week-ahead-schedule-for-march-2-6</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Sun, 01 Mar 2015 21:47:00 EST</pubDate>    <description>A look ahead at Sen. U.S. Senator Chris Coons (D-Del.) on Friday praised the Obama Administration&rsquo;s new trade cooperation agreement with the five nations of the East African Community (EAC) &ndash; Burundi, Keny...</description>    <guid>newsroom/releases/release/senator-coons-praises-new-trade-agreement-with-east-african-nations</guid>   </item>                <item>    <title>United States Senate condemns vicious attacks by Boko Haram, urges credible and transparent elections in Nigeria</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/newsroom/releases/release/united-states-senate-condemns-vicious-attacks-by-boko-haram-urges-credible-and-transparent-elections-in-nigeria</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Thu, 26 Feb 2015 10:56:00 EST</pubDate>    <description>WASHINGTON &ndash; The United States Senate this week voted unanimously to condemn the vicious attacks perpetrated by Boko Haram against innocent civilians, especially women and children, and called on Nigeria&rsquo;s government to ensure its upcoming national elections on March 28 and April 11 are safe, credibl...</description>    <guid>newsroom/releases/release/united-states-senate-condemns-vicious-attacks-by-boko-haram-urges-credible-and-transparent-elections-in-nigeria</guid>   </item>                <item>    <title>Senator Coons warns of GOP threat to defund the Department of Homeland Security</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Tue, 24 Feb 2015 12:31:00 EST</pubDate>        <guid></guid>   </item>                <item>    <title>Floor Speech: Senator Coons urges Republicans to fund Department of Homeland Security</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/newsroom/statements_and_speeches/in-floor-speech-senator-coons-urges-republicans-to-fund-department-of-homeland-security</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Tue, 24 Feb 2015 11:25:00 EST</pubDate>    <description>Mr. President, I have come to the floor this evening to speak about the impending shutdown this week of the federal Department of Homeland Security. At a time when the folks I hear from in Delaware, and I suspect what all of the members in this chamber are hearing, as we return from a week spent in our home stat...</description>    <guid>newsroom/statements_and_speeches/in-floor-speech-senator-coons-urges-republicans-to-fund-department-of-homeland-security</guid>   </item>                <item>    <title>The Senator's Week Ahead Schedule for February 23-March 1</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/blog/post/the-senators-week-ahead-schedule-for-february-23-march-1</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Sun, 22 Feb 2015 21:50:00 EST</pubDate>    <description>A look ahead at Senator Coons' schedule,...</description>    <guid>blog/post/the-senators-week-ahead-schedule-for-february-23-march-1</guid>   </item>                <item>    <title>United States Senate honors Lunar New Year</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/newsroom/releases/release/united-states-senate-honors-lunar-new-year</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Wed, 18 Feb 2015 16:33:00 EST</pubDate>    <description>WASHINGTON &ndash; The United States Senate has unanimously approved a resolution recognizing the cultural and historical significance of the Lunar New Year, which begins Thursday, to the Asian American community. U.S. Senator Chris Coons (D-Del.) introduced the resolution with Senators John Cornyn (R-Texas), Ma...</description>    <guid>newsroom/releases/release/united-states-senate-honors-lunar-new-year</guid>   </item>                <item>    <title>The Senator's Week Ahead Schedule for February 16-22</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/blog/post/the-senators-week-ahead-schedule-for-february-16-22</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Mon, 16 Feb 2015 20:57:00 EST</pubDate>    <description>A look ahead to Senator Coons' public schedule.&nbsp;...</description>    <guid>blog/post/the-senators-week-ahead-schedule-for-february-16-22</guid>   </item>                <item>    <title>Senator Coons reintroduces bipartisan bill to reform and modernize America&#x2019;s food aid program</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/newsroom/releases/release/senator-coons-reintroduces-bipartisan-bill-to-reform-and-modernize-americas-food-aid-program</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Fri, 13 Feb 2015 09:19:00 EST</pubDate>    <description>WASHINGTON &ndash; U.S. Senators Chris Coons (D-Del.) and Bob Corker (R-Tenn.), both members of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee, have reintroduced bipartisan legislation (S.525) to reform U.S. global food assistance programs that will free up as much as $440 million annually through greater efficiencies i...</description>    <guid>newsroom/releases/release/senator-coons-reintroduces-bipartisan-bill-to-reform-and-modernize-americas-food-aid-program</guid>   </item>                <item>    <title>Senator Coons reintroduces bill to protect Americans&#x2019; electronic data stored abroad</title>                               <link>http://www.coons.senate.gov/newsroom/releases/release/senator-coons-reintroduces-bill-to-protect-americans-electronic-data-stored-abroad</link>                  <author>webmaster</author>    <pubDate>Thu, 12 Feb 2015 13:13:00 EST</pubDate>    <description>WASHINGTON &ndash; U.S. Senator Chris Coons (D-Del.) joined with Senators Orrin Hatch (R-Utah) and Dean Heller (R-Nev.) today to reintroduce the bipartisan Law Enforcement Access to Data Stored Abroad (&ldquo;LEADS&rdquo;) Act, which will reform the Electronic Communications Privacy Act (ECPA) to promote interna...</description>    <guid>newsroom/releases/release/senator-coons-reintroduces-bill-to-protect-americans-electronic-data-stored-abroad</guid>   </item>    </channel> </rss>
